title: Statement by the Press Secretary H.R. 2715 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 12, 2011

 



Statement by the Press Secretary H.R. 2715





On Friday, August 12, 2011, the President signed into law: 

	H.R. 2715, which makes changes to current consumer product safety standards, including to provide the Consumer Product Safety Commission with greater authority and discretion to implement current law without overburdening certain manufacturers.
